text.div: This code system http://www.nubc.org/PointOfOriginForAdmissionOrVisit defines many codes, but they are not represented here

name: AHANUBCPointOfOriginForAdmissionOrVisit
title: AHA NUBC Point Of Origin For Admission Or Visit
description: UB-04 Point of Origin for Admission or Visit (FL-15)
copyright:
